response.overview: In the ravaged near-future, a savage motorcycle gang rules the road. Terrorizing innocent civilians while tearing up the streets, the ruthless gang laughs in the face of a police force hell-bent on stopping them.
response.tagline: The maximum force of the future.
response.title: Mad Max

titles.title: Mad Max: O ekdikitis tis nyhtas

results.name: George Miller on Making MAD MAX & MAD MAX 2
